name: Super Bario bro
description:
Oh no! Bario is sick! 

But don't worry! He's not alone, he's got his trusty brother Luigo to help him out!

Bario has fallen horribly sick, and as a result he is no longer able to save the beautiful princess Apple. His brother Luigo has decided that its his turn to save the Fungus kingdom from the evil browser, his name is Chrome. Luigo pulls out his trusty rocket launcher that he keeps in his pocket at all times, and decides he will push Bario to the finish line.

Use WASD to move around, left mouse button to shoot Bario, and R if you get softlocked! This is a meme game in every definition of the term, so don't expect much from it.
